justification: This supplier has been verified as a legitimate fuel supplier operating under a different legal name. The similarity to the sanctioned entity is coincidental. Business relationship has been established for 5 years with clean compliance record. Required for continued operations at Singapore station.
approver_comments: Verified supplier identity documents. Name similarity is coincidental. Approved for 6 months.
conditions: Subject to quarterly compliance review. Must maintain updated KYC documentation.

justification: Emergency fuel requirement for stranded aircraft in transit. Aircraft diverted due to weather emergency and requires minimum fuel for technical ferry flight to non-embargoed destination. No commercial passengers. One-time humanitarian exception requested per OFAC general license provisions.
